title: Riot fails community - Troll Brothers
body: So we have these Duo trolls that roam around the depths of bronze.. I mean they follow the mid guy or jungler 3mid or 3jungle and leave the lanes to get pushed. drops 2 pinks in the spawn at the start etc, etc .... how come they are still around.. does this mean that Riot is Failing the community? I had not met them in a long while but my reset went badly (sigh) and now i have been queued with them for several games now. they just mess the game up weather you are with them or against them. Is there some way to get them banned for good? I pity the people queued with them .. as i wont be at the bottom of bronze for long ...

replies.body: The only thing you can do is probably to just report them and hope for the best.

They say "Dont  you know by now ? Trolling never gets anyone banned.."  I report them ever game so I guess they are right :-(
